modName: AGTweaks - Allow Three Enchantments - Extra Effects
summary: This mod changes the perk \"Extra Effect\" into \"Extra Effects\" - letting you put three enchantments on one item.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://img21.imageshack.us/img21/4505/7tw.png[/img]
[size=6]Allow Three Enchantments[/size]
[size=5]Made By Request[/size][/center]
 
 
 
[size=6]Description[/size]
[size=4]This mod was made by request
This mod changes the perk \"Extra Effect\" into \"Extra Effects\" - letting you put three enchantments on one item.
[/size]

 

[size=6]Requirements[/size]
[size=4]None.[/size]
 
 
 
[size=6]Compatibility[/size]
With everything that doesnt change the perks (Skill interface Retexture is ok).
 
 
[size=6]Installtion + Unistalltion[/size]
[size=4]Use the nod manager and everything should be fine.[/size]
author: AGTweaks
